text: Daniel Ong is a Singaporean footballer who plays for Balestier United RC as a Goalkeeper. He started his career with Balestier Khalsa in 2009. ==Career== ===Balestier Khalsa=== Ong started his footballing career with Balestier Khalsa in 2009. However, he only made 4 appearances from 2009 to 2013. ===Home United=== He then went on to sign for Home United for the 2014 S.League but made no appearance for the team. ===Warriors=== After a disappointing season as he made no appearance, he went to sign for Warriors where he made 18 appearances for the team. ===Return to Balestier=== It was announced that Ong would join back the club where he made his debut, Balestier Khalsa in 2016. ===Balestier United=== He joined the sister team after being released by the Tigers at the end of the 2016 season. ==Honours== ===Club=== Balestier Khalsa *League Cup: 2013 ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Singaporean footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Balestier Khalsa FC players Category:Warriors FC players
title: Daniel Ong (footballer)
